name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rocky - Save Linkedin Profiles straight to Notion

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save Linkedin Profiles to Notion, in 1 Click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rocky is the BEST way to automatically save Linkedin profiles. With just 1 click, you can export any profile's name, bio, job title, & job experience from Linkedin ➡️ Notion 

Use Rocky to....
✅ Create a Personal or Professional CRM
✅ Save notes for later about any Linkedin profile
✅ Organize Linkedin connections with ease
✅ Create powerful automations
& so much more!
